Sentiments.Phrase: like the one my mother gave me
but I was already wearing it, I swear!
I love that necklace with all my heart!

Hints: I need her to take the fall for the theft.
Why would she steal the necklace? I need a convincing reason.
Maybe I should get rid of the word 'not'.
FailureMessages: No, no! I need to try again.
This won't hold up in court!
I need to try again. It's not quite right.
I don't think the jury will buy this...
EmptyFailureMessage: I have to record something. The jury will want to see some evidence...
